name: Baby Battle Royale
description:
Baby Battle Royale is a two player game.  

Two controllers are required to play.

Stack your building blocks and climb your way out of the play pen before your opponent! 

How To Play Created in 48 hours For #SDGJ2018

Code - William Wylie-Modro (wwyliemodro@gmail.com)

Code - Leonardo Jasso (www.goodenoughgang.com)

Art - Eric Jasso (www.goodenoughgang.com)

Art / Animation - Ricardo Yanofsky (ricardotnet@gmail.com)
